always-dark.name: Always Dark
always-dark.description: Instead of gradually going to full opacity from 0% - max-percent%, it now takes 0% - 3% to get full opacity.

max-opacity.name: Max Opacity
max-opacity.description: Customize the max darkness of the flashlight. (0% - 100%)

max-percent.name: Max Percent
max-percent.description: Sets the percent that the flashlight gets to full opacity at.
